mapper.sql: br.id, br.bookId, br.borrowerId, br.borrowDate, br.returnDate, b.bookName as bookName, u.UserName as borrowerName
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BorrowRecords (bookId, borrowerId, borrowDate) VALUES (#{bookId}, #{borrowerId}, #{borrowDate})
mapper.select: SELECT FROM BorrowRecords br LEFT JOIN Books b ON br.bookId = b.id LEFT JOIN Users u ON br.borrowerId = u.UserID WHERE br.borrowerId = #{borrowerId} ORDER BY br.borrowDate DESC
